notificationFields_.label: Icon
notificationFields_.tooltip: On Android: sets value to "myicon" for drawable resource "myicon.png"

notificationFields_.label: Badge
notificationFields_.tooltip: Indicates the badge on client app home icon

notificationFields_.label: Tag
notificationFields_.tooltip: Indicates whether each notification message results in a new entry on the notification center on Android

notificationFields_.label: Color
notificationFields_.tooltip: Indicates color of the icon, expressed in #rrggbb format

notificationFields_.label: Click Action
notificationFields_.tooltip: The action associated with a user click on the notification

notificationFields_.label: Body Loc Key
notificationFields_.tooltip: The key to the body string for localization

notificationFields_.label: Title Loc Key
notificationFields_.tooltip: The key to the title string for localization

notificationFields_.label: Body Loc Args (JSON)
notificationFields_.tooltip: The string value to replace format specifiers in body string for localization

notificationFields_.label: Title Loc Args (JSON)
notificationFields_.tooltip: The string value to replace format specifiers in title string for localization

optionsFields_.label: Dry Run
optionsFields_.tooltip: This parameter, when set to true, allows developers to test a request without actually sending a message

optionsFields_.label: Delay While Idle
optionsFields_.tooltip: When this parameter is set to true, it indicates that the message should not be sent until the device becomes active

optionsFields_.label: Content Available
optionsFields_.tooltip: If true, an inactive client app is awoken

optionsFields_.label: Time to Live
optionsFields_.tooltip: How long (in seconds) the message should be kept in GCM storage if the device is offline. Max = 4 weeks

optionsFields_.label: Collapse Key
optionsFields_.tooltip: Identifies a group of messages that can be collapsed, so that only the last message gets sent when delivery can be resumed
